name: 气候之女ClimateDaughter
description:
你将扮演气候女神，通过控制移动阻挡你的各种特殊效果的气候团块走向终点神山，拯救父亲。可是，摧毁城市的代价又应该由谁补偿？

游戏玩法类似华容道，但是又有很多特殊功能，会有一些看似不可能完成的谜题。

鼠标左键选择气候团块，WASD控制移动。

机制：

高原山地气候：阻挡玩家

季风性气候：奇数回合时把你往回推一个格子，偶数回合把你往前推一个格子

冰原气候：在原地留下不可穿过的冰原

沙漠性气候：在原地留下沙漠，沙漠会不断的向左延展，雨林可以阻挡延展，气候和玩家完全无法穿过沙漠

雨林性气候：在原地产生雨林，可以阻挡沙漠，玩家进入雨林后将无法离开

还有一个隐藏结局，欢迎来玩！

本作为48小时gamejam作品，做的不好请多多包涵

We'll upload English version a few days later!

You will play the role of the goddess of climate, by controlling the movement of various special effects of climate clumps to get the end of the mountain, to save your father. However, who should compensate for the cost of destroying the city?

The gameplay is similar to Huarong Dao, but there are many special functions, and there will be some seemingly impossible puzzles.

The left mouse button selects the climate block, and the WASD controls the movement.

Mechanism:

Plateau and mountain climate: blocking players

Monsoon climate: Push you back by one square in odd rounds, and push you forward by one square in even rounds

Ice field climate: leaving an impenetrable ice field in place

Desert climate: leaving a desert in place, the desert will continue to extend to the left, the rain forest can block the extension, the climate and the player cannot pass through the desert at all

Rainforest climate: A rainforest is generated in place, which can block the desert. Players cannot leave after entering the rainforest

There is also a hidden ending, welcome to play!

This is a 48-hour gamejam work, please forgive me if it is not done well!
